QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cmn_inv_mappings.id odf_pk, cmn_inv_mappings.code as code, updated.full_name as updated_by, CREATED.created_date as created_date, updated.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, cmn_inv_mappings.INVESTMENT_TYPE as inv_type, created.full_name as created_by from cmn_inv_mappings cmn_inv_mappings JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=cmn_inv_mappings.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=cmn_inv_mappings.last_updated_by where 1 = 1
